hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:On Fridays the Prophet (ﷺ) used to recite Alif Lam Mim Tanzil-As-Sajda (in the first rak`a) and Hal ata `alal-insani i.e. Surat ad-Dahr (LXXVI) (in the second rak`a), in the Fajr prayer

chapter.eng-name: To prostrate during the recitation of Salat Tanzil - As-Sajda (No. 32)
